items.title: Ministry of Inspiration 1: 'Instant' Happiness. Why Wait?
items.headline: Richard Wilkins, the UK's Minister for Inspiration, and Tom Cassidy's mentor, shows us 9 tools for instant happiness.
objectives_summary: By the end of the course you will know how to be happy instantly. At will. Without drama and trickery.
You will learn that the voice in your head talking you out of being happy, being awesome, being great is not you.
You will know how to apply the tools of The Script, The Sausage Machine, Simpson's Syndrome and many others, moment to moment to help you feel good when you most want to. i.e. NOW!
